trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesigner%2A> event occurs when the currently active document changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesigner%2A>目前作用中的文件變更時，就會發生事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The active document changes when a new document is created, an existing document is opened, or a document is closed.
trans-unit.target: 主動式文件變更時建立新的文件、 開啟現有文件時，或已關閉文件。

trans-unit.source: When you create an ActiveDesignerEventArgs delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 ActiveDesignerEventArgs 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The document that is losing activation.
The document that is gaining activation.
Gets the document that is gaining activation.
trans-unit.target: 取得已獲得啟用的文件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the document gaining activation.
Gets the document that is losing activation.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the document losing activation.
